text: Guida Maria (23 January 1950 – 2 January 2018) was a Portuguese actress. Her career lasted 60 years. She was born in Lisbon. She first appeared as Helen Keller in The Miracle Worker. In 1973, Maria starred in the movie The Vows. She appeared on television shows including A Única Mulher (The Only Woman) and the Brazilian series O Bem-Amado. Maria died at a Lisbon hospital of pancreatic cancer on 2 January 2018 at the age of 67. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1950 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Portugal Category:Portuguese movie actors Category:Portuguese television actors Category:Portuguese voice actors Category:Portuguese stage actors Category:Actors from Lisbon
title: Guida Maria
